name: Special Education Services
description: Plan that details what a school will do to ensure it is meeting the needs of qualified students with disabilities. Designed to meet individual needs of each eligible student. Examples: Nursing services for student with diabetes, Allow student with writing disability to use a computer for writing assignments.
